entry.title: vfio
entry.summary: vfio qemu vfio_realize =&gt; vfio_attach_device =&gt; VFIOIOMMUClass-&gt;attach_device : vfio_iommu_legacy_class_init : iommufd_cdev_attach vfio_iommu_legacy_attach_device vfio_iommu_legacy_attach_device =&gt; groupid = vfio_device_groupid() =&gt; group_patch = readlink("/sys//sys/devices/pci{domain}:{bus}/{domain}:{bus}/{b:d.f}/iommu_group") ...

entry.title: qemu brige migration
entry.summary: PCI bridge dev vmstate static const VMStateDescription pci_bridge_dev_vmstate = { .name = "pci_bridge", .priority = MIG_PRI_PCI_BUS, .fields = (VMStateField[]) { VMSTATE_PCI_DEVICE(parent_obj, PCIBridge), SHPC_VMSTATE(shpc, PCIDevice, pci_device_shpc_present), VMSTATE_END_OF_LIST() } }; 而pci_bridge type为: static const TypeInfo pci_bridge_type_info = {...
